events.comment: Clicking outside of the inventory windows will close it
If click on an inventory slot

events.name: Collect items and add to inventory

events.comment: Check if need to add an item
Look for a slot that already display the same item as picked
in case a slot is found, add item to inventory

In case, there is no slot with the same item displayed as picked, look for a free slot
In case free slot is found, pass the item name to the slot and set the animaton of the slot to display the item

parameters: "Es la llave para abrir tu cofre"
"¡Para Pedro - Número uno - el mejor aventurero del mundo!"
